titles.title: NASA Enhanced Use Leasing Extension Act of 2019
NASA Enhanced Use Leasing Extension Act of 2019
NASA Enhanced Use Leasing Extension Act of 2019
A bill to extend the authority of the National Aeronautics and Space Administration to enter into leases of non-excess property of the Administration.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.
Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation. Reported by Senator Wicker without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 324.

action.text: By Senator Wicker from Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation filed written report. Report No. 116-260.

bill.summary:
NASA Enhanced Use Leasing Extension Act of 2019
This bill extends through 2021 the authority of the National Aeronautics and Space Administration (NASA) to lease its non-excess real property and related personal property.
